name: Rat Familiar
summary: You have a pet rat that has become magically bonded to you.
description:
You have a pet rat that has become magically bonded to you. You gain a familiar using the rules here, and this familiar must be a rat. It still gets the benefits of familiar abilities, but its base form remains a rat.Traits

Ratfolk: A creature with this trait is a member of the ratfolk ancestry. Ratfolk are humanoids who resemble rats. An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by ratfolk.
